rules_text:
Enchant creature
As long as you control enchanted creature, it gets +2/+2. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.
Conceive 1–{3}{W} [i]({3}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Elemental creature token, then create a token that's a copy of this card attached to it. Conceive only as a sorcery.)[/i]
